A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Well\, after 2 years of very good Star Wars Movies\, this film is one of the worst Star Wars movies.
The movie starts of great but falls of quickly.
Reys Jedi Training arc is extremely boring. The Fin arc is like watching the prequells again and it should have been cut out of the movie. Nothing good comes of that storyline.
There are some high points during the movie. Reys and Kylos interactions are not bad\, but are also screaming wasted potential. 
All in all not a great movie\, full of plot holes and wasted oportunities.
